text:
I found a spelling/syntax error in the Ant documentation for the javadoc task.  
It says that one of the nested elements is "groups", but the example shows 
"group" and performing the antstructure task produces "group" as one of the 
nested elements.  Not a huge deal, but I thought I should mention it to someone.

Also, the following attributes are not listed in the documentation for the 
javadoc task.  I've listed what antstructure generated about them:
   defaultexcludes %boolean; #IMPLIED
   excludepackagenames CDATA #IMPLIED
creator: rxh@gers.com
